verses.kjv: Woe to them that devise iniquity, and work evil upon their beds! when the morning is light, they practise it, because it is in the power of their hand.
verses.ct: Disaster is coming for those who lie in bed planning wicked schemes! As soon as morning arrives, they carry them out because they have the power to do it.

verses.kjv: And they covet fields, and take them by violence; and houses, and take them away: so they oppress a man and his house, even a man and his heritage.
verses.ct: They desire fields and seize them by force; they want houses and simply take them. They crush people and their families, robbing them of their inherited land.

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the LORD; Behold, against this family do I devise an evil, from which ye shall not remove your necks; neither shall ye go haughtily: for this time is evil.
verses.ct: So this is what the LORD says: Pay attention — I am planning disaster against this group of people, and you won't be able to escape it. You will no longer walk around with your heads held high, because it will be a terrible time.

verses.kjv: In that day shall one take up a parable against you, and lament with a doleful lamentation, and say, We be utterly spoiled: he hath changed the portion of my people: how hath he removed it from me! turning away he hath divided our fields.
verses.ct: When that day comes, people will mock you with a taunting song and cry out in bitter grief, saying, 'We are completely ruined! He has taken away my people's land. How it has been stripped from me! He has divided up our fields and given them to traitors.'

verses.kjv: Therefore thou shalt have none that shall cast a cord by lot in the congregation of the LORD.
verses.ct: Because of this, you will have no one left to divide land by lot in the assembly of the LORD.

verses.kjv: Prophesy ye not, say they to them that prophesy: they shall not prophesy to them, that they shall not take shame.
verses.ct: 'Stop prophesying!' they tell the prophets. So the prophets will stop speaking to them, and disgrace will not be avoided.

verses.kjv: O thou that art named the house of Jacob, is the spirit of the LORD straitened? are these his doings? do not my words do good to him that walketh uprightly?
verses.ct: Should it be said, descendants of Jacob, 'Is the Spirit of the LORD impatient? Are these really his actions?' Don't my words bring good to those who live with integrity?

verses.kjv: Even of late my people is risen up as an enemy: ye pull off the robe with the garment from them that pass by securely as men averse from war.
verses.ct: But lately my own people have turned into an enemy. You strip the rich cloak right off the backs of those passing by peacefully, people who want nothing to do with conflict.

verses.kjv: The women of my people have ye cast out from their pleasant houses; from their children have ye taken away my glory for ever.
verses.ct: You have driven the women of my people out of their comfortable homes. You have stolen my blessing from their children permanently.

verses.kjv: Arise ye, and depart; for this is not your rest: because it is polluted, it shall destroy you, even with a sore destruction.
verses.ct: Get up and leave! This is no longer your place of rest. Because it has been made unclean, it will bring you destruction — total and devastating destruction.

verses.kjv: If a man walking in the spirit and falsehood do lie, saying, I will prophesy unto thee of wine and of strong drink; he shall even be the prophet of this people.
verses.ct: If some liar and deceiver were to come along and say, 'I'll prophesy for you about wine and beer,' that's exactly the kind of prophet these people want!

verses.kjv: I will surely assemble, O Jacob, all of thee; I will surely gather the remnant of Israel; I will put them together as the sheep of Bozrah, as the flock in the midst of their fold: they shall make great noise by reason of the multitude of men.
verses.ct: I will certainly gather all of you together, Jacob. I will bring together the survivors of Israel. I will unite them like sheep in a pen, like a flock in its pasture — the place will be buzzing with the noise of so many people.

verses.kjv: The breaker is come up before them: they have broken up, and have passed through the gate, and are gone out by it: and their king shall pass before them, and the LORD on the head of them.
verses.ct: The one who breaks through barriers will go ahead of them. They will break through the gate and march out through it. Their king will pass through ahead of them, with the LORD leading them at the front.
